{{also|mensch|mènsch|Mënsch}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|mensche}}, {{m|gmh|mensch}}, from {{inh|de|goh|mennisko}}, a substantivization of the adjective {{m|goh|mennisk}}, from {{m|goh|man}} (whence modern {{m|de|Mann}}). (The word is retained as an adjective in some German dialects.) Compare {{cog|yi|מענטש}}, {{cog|nl|mens}}, {{cog|sv|människa}}, all with the primary sense of ‘person’ or ‘human being’. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/mɛnʃ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Mensch.ogg|audio}} * {{homophones|de|mensch}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Menschen|Menschen|Menschchen|dim2=Menschlein}} # [[human]], [[human being]], [[person]] # {{lb|de|interjection}} [[man]] ====Usage notes==== * ''Mensch'' is a weak noun in the standard language but is part of a group of nouns with a stark tendency to be strong colloquially so one might hear ''dem Mensch'' instead of ''dem Menschen''. * In older literature, the genitive ''des Menschens'' may occur. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|en|en}} ====Hyponyms==== * {{l|de|Bub}}, {{l|de|Bube}} * {{l|de|Junge}} * {{l|de|Mann}} ====Derived terms==== {{col5|de |Affenmensch |Elefantenmensch |Frühmensch |Gutmensch |Herrenmensch |Jetztmensch |Lebensmensch |Mensch ärgere Dich nicht |Menschenaffe |menschengemacht |Menschengeschlecht |Menschenmüll |menschlich |Menschwerdung |Schlangenmensch |Schneemensch |Übermensch |Untermensch |Vormensch |Frauenmensch |Fraumensch }} [[Category:de:Human]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|hrx|gmh|mensche}}, {{m|gmh|mensch}}, from {{inh|hrx|goh|mennisko}}, a substantivization of the adjective {{m|goh|mennisk}}, from {{m|goh|man}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/mɛnʃ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m|plural|Mensche}} # [[human]], [[human being]], [[person]] #: {{ux|hrx|Keen '''Mensch''' konnd do leve.|No '''human being''' could live here.}} ===Further reading=== * [http://www.hunsrik.org/Lexi/SearchResult?searchStr=Mensch Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Plautdietsch== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|pdt|gml|mensche}}, {{m|gml|minsche}}, from {{inh|pdt|osx|mennisk}}, {{m|osx|mennisko}}, from {{inh|pdt|gem-pro|*menniskaz}}. ===Noun=== {{head|pdt|noun|g=m|plural|Menschen}} # [[human]], [[human being]], [[person]] [[Category:Plautdietsch one-syllable nouns]]
